Texts.Eng: Bees won't be happy without flowers to pollinate. Get a ^orange;Red Flower^reset; to plant next to your apiary and your bees will get going!

Pretty much any flower will do, by the way. And be patient. Bees take time to breed, and they only ^green;'do it'^reset; when there are flowers and sun. ^orange;Bee Flowers^reset; are their favorite, and will make them work hardest.
